description: Triangle whose rows are the degrees of the irreducible representations of the groups PSL(2,p) as p runs through the primes.
references: J. H. Conway, R. T. Curtis, S. P. Norton, R. A. Parker and R. A. Wilson, ATLAS of Finite Groups, Oxford Univ. Press, 1985.
links: J. S. Kimberley, First 123 rows of A060246 triangle, flattened.
prog: (MAGMA) CharacterTable(PSL(2,7)); (say)(MAGMA) &cat[[Degree(irred): irred in CharacterTable(PSL(2, p))]: p in PrimesUpTo(30)];
crossrefs: Consecutive row sequences from 3rd to 11th are: A003860, A003879, A003882, A003883, A003885, A003886, A003887, A003890, A003891.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 22 2001
